metadata.title: CVE-2016-4300 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the read_SubStreamsInfo function inarchive_read_support_format_7zip.c in libarchive before 3.2.1 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via a 7zip file with a large number ofsubstreams, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4300` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2').
